nodes.text: Ah, the meddler arrives. Witness the culmination of centuries of preparation!
You have no concept of true power. The Ancient One's awakening cannot be stopped!
Insanity? No. This is divine purpose! The sacrifices, the gathered power, all for this moment!

responses.text: Then I'll stop you by force.

nodes.text: The ritual is nearly complete. Your death will be the final offering!
